content.question:
All coordinates are approximate.

The curve labeled A begins at a point (negative 1 comma negative pi over 2), trends up to the right steeply then gradually to the point (0 comma 0), and trends up to the right gradually then steeply, ending at the point (1 comma pi over 2).

The curve labeled B begins at a point (one half comma 0), trends up to the left steeply then gradually to the point (0 comma pi over 2), and trends up to the left gradually then steeply, ending at the point (negative one half comma pi).

The curve labeled C begins at a point (one comma 0), trends up to the left steeply then gradually to the point (0 comma pi), and trends up to the left gradually then steeply, ending at the point (negative one comma 2 pi).

The curve labeled D begins at a point (2 comma 0), trends up to the left steeply then gradually to the point (0 comma pi over 2), and trends up to the left gradually then steeply, ending at the point (negative 2 comma pi).

​The figure gives the graphs of four functions labeled <math alttext="A"><semantics><mi>A</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="B"><semantics><mi>B</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="C"><semantics><mi>C</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="D"><semantics><mi>D</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. Which is the graph of <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 cos to the power of negative 1 end exponent x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
